description: Kyle King and Bo Dean celebrate their team's victory with some hot post-game action. Kyle's expert deep-throat skills drive Bo into a frenzy; he rips off Kyle's uniform and they maneuver into a 69. The game changes when King sits down on Dean's huge dick then gets on all fours and orders Dean to go deep. Both men shoot and score!
title: Score! Game 1
